{"id":944714944,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1683259242,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2606 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/944714944/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost of a Path With Special Roads","memory":"27 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def minimumCost(self, start: List[int], target: List[int], specialRoads: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        (xs, ys), (xt, yt) = start, target\n        adj = defaultdict(dict)\n        nodes = set(map(tuple, (start, target)))\n        for x1, y1, x2, y2, w in specialRoads:\n            adj[(x1, y1)][(x2, y2)] = min(adj[(x1, y1)].get((x2, y2), +inf), w)\n            nodes.add((x1, y1))\n            nodes.add((x2, y2))\n        for p1, p2 in permutations(nodes, 2):\n            w = self.getCost(p1, p2)\n            adj[p1][p2] = min(adj[p1].get(p2, +inf), w)\n            adj[p2][p1] = min(adj[p2].get(p1, +inf), w)\n        \n        dist = defaultdict(lambda: +inf)\n        dist[(xs, ys)] = 0\n        queue = [(xs, ys)]\n        while queue:\n            u = queue.pop()\n            for v in adj[u]:\n                if dist[u] + adj[u][v] < dist[v]:\n                    dist[v] = dist[u] + adj[u][v]\n                    queue.append(v)\n        return dist[(xt, yt)]\n        \n    def getCost(self, a, b):\n        return abs(a[0] - b[0]) + abs(a[1] - b[1])","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-of-a-path-with-special-roads","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
